name: OwO the cat: The mystery of The Smol Village
name_original: OwO the cat: The mystery of The Smol Village
description:
Introduction:

OwO the Cat: The Mystery of The Smol Village is a short, non-combative story driven rpg made in one month.

Play as OwO, a mute genderless bust most importantly very tall humanoid cat and set out to find out what is happening in The Smol Village. The game is rather short and not that close to a traditional rpg, but I hope most of you can enjoy it.

Features:

-minimalist retro pixel graphics

-dialogue driven story

-a very tall cat >:3

Heads up:

I am not an artists and so the game is rather weak when it comes to visuals. Still it is a story I wanted to tell, regardless of the lacking visual quality.
